data.message: He is also a great person/man/father.  Adopted kids that weren't his, stopped drinking and doing drugs.  Cleaned up his act for his kids.  There is more to know about this man than just his music.  His music just makes him money.  The person he is makes him rich!

replies.message: You know him personally? Aw man, What's he like bro???

No I don't know him personally. If you look you can find out anything about any person in the world. My daughter does research on an artist if she likes their music. If they have a positive life she continues to listen to them. If they don't she stops listening to them. Eminem happens to be her favorite. 
Why did you make that snotty comment? If you could comprehend what you read you would have known this information yourself. It's on Wikipedia.
